No tooth brush inside the pack

I purchased this Colgate toothpaste in January to use it over a period of 6 months or so. This special deal comes with 4 individually packed toothpaste tubes. The first 3 packets I used over a period of 4 to 5 months were fine. However, the toothpaste tube in the last packet I opened after about 5 months was damaged. By this time the return period was over. Hence, I do not have any option other that writing this review. I have purchased such deals in the past. However, this is the first time I had this issue. So my rating is only for this consignment.
